      • backgroundColor

        public Theme.Builder backgroundColor​(int backgroundColor)
        Background color. Displayed in lists and a navigation drawer. Used also as a text color for toolbar title and buttons on authorization/local/camera screens.
        Parameters:
        backgroundColor - int representation of a color

      • accentColor

        public Theme.Builder accentColor​(int accentColor)
        Accent color. Used as a color for toolbar, selection markers and navigation drawer items.
        Parameters:
        accentColor - int representation of a color

      • textColor

        public Theme.Builder textColor​(int textColor)
        Text color. Used as a color for text in camera/local/authorization/file list screens.
        Parameters:
        textColor - int representation of a color

      • build

        public Theme build()
        Builds a new theme based on provided parameters.
        Returns:
        new Theme instance
